comprehensive_overview: ScaLAPACK (Scalable LAPACK) is a parallel version of LAPACK (Linear Algebra PACKage) for distributed memory machines. It is designed to efficiently solve large-scale problems in numerical linear algebra using parallelism.
core_features: Parallel algorithms for dense linear algebra operations
Support for BLAS (Basic Linear Algebra Subprograms)
Matrix factorizations, linear equation solving, least squares problems
Highly efficient and scalable for large matrices
Used in scientific computing and high-performance computing applications
